DOC.brief_title: 1 % Metformin Gel Treatment Class II Furcation Defects
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Metformin ( MF ) , biguanide group anti-diabetic drug show enhance osteoblast differentiation inhibit osteoclast differentiation vitro , thus may exhibit favourable effect alveolar bone . The present study aim explore efficacy 1 % MF gel local drug delivery system adjunct scale root planing ( SRP ) treatment Class II furcation defect comparison placebo gel . Methods : Sixty four patient single mandibular buccal class II furcation defect categorize two treatment group : SRP plus 1 % MF ( group 1 ) SRP plus placebo ( group 2 ) . Clinical parameter record baseline , 3 month , 6 month , 9 month , radiographic parameter record baseline , 6 month , 9 month . Defect fill baseline , 6 month , 9 month calculate standardized radiograph use image analysis software .
